title: The Right’s New Definition of Hate Speech, Gwyneth’s $75 Bag Of Poop 11.02.22
itunes:title: The Right’s New Definition of Hate Speech, Gwyneth’s $75 Bag Of Poop 11.02.22
description:
In episode 1364, Miles and guest co-host Jacquis Neal are joined by hosts of Locatora Radio, Mala Muñoz and Diosa Femme, to discuss… Right Wing Violence Continues to Escalate and So Do Their Rationalizations, Goop’s Class Warfare Gift Guide is Back and more!

  1. Right Wing Violence Continues to Escalate and So Do Their Rationalizations
  2. United States vs. David Wayne Depape
  3. Goop’s Class Warfare Gift Guide is Back

LISTEN: T-Shirt by Migos

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
